SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller for the Game. Is responsible for receiving the requests from views, updating the Game's model, and notifying the views of the changes that have occurred. This class can be used by multiple threads without risk of conflicts, as all public methods are synchronized GameController instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(LobbyManager lobbyManager, GameModel game)
      Constructs a new GameController for the given GameModel.
      Parameters:
      game - The GameModel linked to this controller.

  • Method Details

    • isRejoiningAfterCrash

      public boolean isRejoiningAfterCrash()
      Returns:
      whether the game being controlled is being reloaded after a server crash.

    • createPlayer

      public void createPlayer(String username) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Creates a new player and adds it to the game. By default, the player is considered disconnected.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - Thrown if the game is already full, if the game has already started, or if a player with the given username is already present in the game.

    • joinPlayer

      public void joinPlayer(String username, RemoteClientInterface userView) throws UnexpectedActionException
      Sets the player with the given username's status to connected, and adds it to the list of players which should receive updates about the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If an invalid username is given, this method does nothing.
      userView - The RemoteClientInterface, used to communicate with the player.
      Throws:
      UnexpectedActionException - If a user with the given username is already connected, or if the user has not been created with createPlayer(java.lang.String).

    • initializingProcedures

      private void initializingProcedures()
      Method used to start the GameState.INIT phase of the game.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(String username, SideType starterSide)
      Set's a player's starter card side. If the player has not yet been given a starter card, or if he has already placed his starter card, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If an invalid username is given, this method does nothing.
      starterSide - The side on which the player decided to place the starter card.

    • initializingColors

      private void initializingColors()
      Starts the color-choosing phase.

    • promptColor

      private void promptColor()
      Prompts the correct player to choose their color.

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(String username, PlayerColor color)
      Sets a player's color. Will prompt the next player in line to choose their color. If this is the last player to choose their color, the game will move on.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If an invalid username is given, or it is not the given player's turn to choose their color, this method does nothing.
      color - The color chosen by the player. If null, a random color will be assigned.

    • restartingProcedures

      private void restartingProcedures()
      Handles the updating of all the views after a game has restarted after a server crash.

    • distributeCards

      private void distributeCards()
      Starts the card distribution phase of the game.

    • distributeObjectives

      private void distributeObjectives()
      Starts the objective distribution phase of the game.

    • setPlayerObjective

      public void setPlayerObjective(String username, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard)
      Sets the player's objective. If all players have chosen their objective, the game will move on.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If an invalid username is given, this method does nothing.
      objectiveCard - The chosen objective card. If the user doesn't have this card, this method will do nothing.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Actually starts the game. After this, the game will be periodically saved.

    • turnManager

      private void turnManager()
      Decides whose turn it is, and prompts the correct player to play. Saves the game if a complete lap has been done.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String username, PlayableCard card, SideType side, Position newPos)
      Places a card on the player's board. If an illegal move was made, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If the username is invalid, or not the current player's username, this method does nothing.
      card - The played card.
      side - The side on which the card is played.
      newPos - The position of the newly placed card.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(String username, DrawType drawType)
      Draws a card for the given player.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username. If the given username is invalid, or it is not the right moment to draw a card, or if it's not the given player's turn, this method does nothing.
      drawType - The type of draw the player has decided to perform.

    • endGame

      private void endGame()
      Ends the game and selects the winners. Communicates to the players the winners of the game. After this, the game's save-file is deleted.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String senderUsername, String text)
      Sends a chat message to everyone in the game.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - The sender's username.
      text - The message content.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String senderUsername, String text, Set<String> receiverUsernames)
      Sends a chat message to the given player.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - The sender's username.
      text - The message content.
      receiverUsernames - The set of players who should receive the message.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String username)
      Pauses the game because of the disconnection of the given player. The game can resume if all players reconnect.
      Parameters:
      username - The player who disconnected. If the given username is not valid, this method does nothing.

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      The non-variable number of players expected to play the game controlled by this controller.

    • getLobbyState

      public LobbyState getLobbyState()
      Returns:
      The LobbyState of the game controlled by this controller.

    • getCurrentPlayerCount

      public int getCurrentPlayerCount()
      Returns:
      The number of players who joined the game.
